segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool, reaching for cookies like it’s the most important thing in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s got one hand in the jar and the other holding a plate, balancing like a circus act.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely trusting him not to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but smile at how determined they both are.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But seriously, that stool is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they get what they want before it all comes crashing down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, clueless about the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the kids even realize how dangerous this is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is a mix of adorable and terrifying.
segments.speaker: PAR
